price: And say: “My Lord, make my landing a blessed landing, for You provide the best landing’”.
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَنزِلۡنِي مُنزَلٗا مُّبَارَكٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمُنزِلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
